participant_abstract.sent: Tara and Poppy presented the prototype and we evaluated it given our criteria and goals.
We checked to see if we were under budget.
Additionally, we discussed how the group navigated the meetings together and decided we liked the leadership, structure, and teamwork of our meetings, and thought they were efficient.

participant_decisions.sent: The final product look was decided on as shown in the prototype.
The remote will be very rounded.

participant_problems.sent: The remote's fruit and vegetable theme wasn't prominent.
